page.title: 03District Nurse in Caversham
page.content: You are made a district nurse by 3 years general training and 6 months district nurse training.You have to have post-graduate experience and a driving licence. My mother works in all the areas of this block except Littlestead Green and the average visits she makes a week are 70.{She wears a blue uniform {with a white collar and a district {nurse badge. My mother drives around in her car. She works from 8.00 a.m. till 5.00 p.m.My mum quite often is training student.She takes them round with her. Nurses work in a team with general practitioners ie.family doctor, health visitor,district midwife (delivers babies),physiotherapists,occupational therapists (they provide walking sticks ,special cutlery etc.) and psychiatrists.
